name: UIMan
tagline: Fast and flexible solution for development and UI management with MVVM pattern
body:
UIMan is fast and flexible solution for UI development and management with MVVM pattern. UIMan is designed most suitable for mobile game. ### Features * Support Databinding, Observable and MVVM for implementing UI with uGUI. * Prefab base UI, async loading. * Auto Code Generation. * UI flow and layer management system. * UI Events. * Customizable loading indicator. * Easy to extend and customize. ### Plugin's Structure

### Detail Documentation [https://goo.gl/PyXBBU](https://goo.gl/PyXBBU) ### Authors and Contributors Đặng Minh Dự (@minhdu) ### Support or Contact Having trouble with UIMan? Check out our [documentation](https://goo.gl/PyXBBU) or [contact support](cp.dev.minhdu@gmail.com) and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
